Class ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.common.dsl.DslDefinitionBase<S,R>
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario.dsl.ScenarioDslDefinitionBase<ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>,EndOfDsl,M>
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario.dsl.ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>
Type Parameters:
M - The response model type of the integration scenario
public class ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M> extends ScenarioDslDefinitionBase<ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>,EndOfDsl,M>
DSL class for specifying orchestration of scenario providers

  • Method Details

    • forInboundConnectors

      public ForScenarioProvidersWithClassDefinition<ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>,M> forInboundConnectors(Class<? extends InboundConnectorDefinition<?>>... connectorClass)
      Specifies inbound connectors that should be orchestrated further by their class.

      No order of execution is guaranteed if more than one class is provided - call this function multiple times if this is necessary.

      Parameters:
      connectorClass - The class(es) of the inbound connector
      Returns:
      DSL handle for specifying consumer calls

    • forScenarioProviders

      public ForScenarioProvidersWithClassDefinition<ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>,M> forScenarioProviders(Class<? extends IntegrationScenarioProviderDefinition>... providerClass)
      Specifies scenario providers that should be orchestrated further by their connector class.

      No order of execution is guaranteed if more than one class is provided - call this function multiple times if this is necessary.

      Parameters:
      providerClass - The class(es) of the inbound connector
      Returns:
      DSL handle for specifying consumer calls

    • forInboundConnectors

      public ForScenarioProvidersWithConnectorIdDefinition<ScenarioOrchestrationDefinition<M>,M> forInboundConnectors(String... inboundConnectorId)
      Specifies inbound connectors that should be orchestrated further by their connector ID.

      No order of execution is guaranteed if more than one ID is provided - call this function multiple times if this is necessary.

      Parameters:
      inboundConnectorId - The ID(s) of the inbound connector
      Returns:
      DSL handle for specifying consumer calls

    • forAnyUnspecifiedScenarioProvider

      public ForScenarioProvidersCatchAllDefinition<EndOfDsl,M> forAnyUnspecifiedScenarioProvider()
      Allows to specify orchestration for all scenario providers (which includes inbound connectors) that are not specifically declared before.

      This is a terminal operation for the provider definitions, so it needs to be the * last call in the list and no additional provider definitions can be specified afterwards.

      Returns:
      DSL handle for specifying consumer calls
